sentence_zh_TW: 在春天的陽光下，湖面上的倒影顯得格外迷人。
sentence: Under the spring sun, the reflection on the ______ looks particularly enchanting.

sentence_zh_TW: 隨著十一月的來臨，冬季的氣息漸漸在空氣中變得明顯。
sentence: With the arrival of ______, the chill of winter becomes more evident in the air.

sentence_zh_TW: 她夢想成為一名著名的女演員，並在好萊塢的電影中表演。
sentence: She dreams of becoming a famous ______ and performing in Hollywood films.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個時期，青少年面臨著許多挑戰和成長的機會。
sentence: During this time, a ______ faces many challenges and opportunities for growth.

sentence_zh_TW: 我喜歡早上吃新鮮的橘子，因為它們既美味又有營養。
sentence: I love eating fresh ______ in the morning because they are both delicious and nutritious.

sentence_zh_TW: 我的早餐通常包括一個煮熟的蛋和一些烤麵包。
sentence: My breakfast usually includes a boiled ______ and some toasted bread.

sentence_zh_TW: 他在公園裡扔球，享受著與朋友一起度過的陽光明媚的下午。
sentence: He likes to ______ the ball in the park, enjoying a sunny afternoon with friends.

sentence_zh_TW: 我過敏的時候，鼻子會感到非常不舒服，這影響了我的日常生活。
sentence: When I'm allergic, my ______ feels quite uncomfortable, affecting my daily life.

sentence_zh_TW: 在困難的時候，一個真正的朋友會給予我們支持和安慰。
sentence: During tough times, a true ______ will offer us support and comfort.

sentence_zh_TW: 如果你有任何問題，隨時可以來詢問我，我會很樂意幫助你。
sentence: ______ you have any questions, feel free to come ask me; I will be more than happy to help.

sentence_zh_TW: 我曾經在這個城市生活過一段時間，對這裡的一切都感到回憶滿滿。
sentence: I lived in this city ______ for a while, and I feel nostalgic about everything here.

sentence_zh_TW: 那個小女孩在公園裡快樂地玩，享受她的童年時光。
sentence: The little ______ is happily playing in the park, enjoying her childhood.

sentence_zh_TW: 我的姐妹總是在我需要幫助的時候出現，讓我倍感珍惜。
sentence: My ______ always shows up when I need help, and I cherish her so much.

sentence_zh_TW: 她在四十歲的時候，感到自己的人生正處於巔峰。
sentence: At ______ years old, she feels that her life is at its peak.

sentence_zh_TW: 我經常會在上課時忘記重要的資訊，這讓我非常困擾。
sentence: I often __________ important information during class, which bothers me greatly.

sentence_zh_TW: 在他的年度信中，他給他的親愛的祖母寫了幾句感人的話。
sentence: In his annual letter, he wrote some touching words to his __________ grandmother.

sentence_zh_TW: 她在院子裡種了各種各樣的花來吸引蝴蝶和蜜蜂。
sentence: She planted a variety of __________ in her yard to attract butterflies and bees.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多孩子在課堂上對有趣的活動表現出他們的喜好，這促進了學習的興趣。
sentence: Many children show their __________ for interesting activities in class, which enhances their interest in learning.

sentence_zh_TW: 這部電影在激動人心的場景後以意外的方式結束，讓觀眾意猶未盡。
sentence: The movie had an unexpected __________ after an exciting scene, leaving the audience wanting more.

sentence_zh_TW: 有時候，不可預測的事情會突然發生，讓我們措手不及。
sentence: Sometimes, unpredictable things can suddenly __________, catching us off guard.
